// Pivot 0, 0
int flipper_right[16] = {
	2, 43,
	41, 2,
	56, 2,
	62, 12,
	60, 25,
	10, 54,
	2, 52,
	0, 47
};

// Pivot 0.000000, 0.000000
float flipper_right[16] = {
	0.031746f, 0.754386f,
	0.650794f, 0.035088f,
	0.888889f, 0.035088f,
